title: Pick to Cart for Multiple Orders
description: An operator uses a smart cart to pick multiple small orders simultaneously in a single pass through the warehouse.

tasks.description: The system creates a batch of 8 small, single-line orders and assigns them to the operator's smart cart.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator's cart terminal shows 8 order slots.

tasks.description: The system directs the operator to a pick location. The operator scans the item.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator is guided along an optimized pick path.

tasks.description: The lights on the smart cart illuminate for the two orders that require this item, indicating where the operator should place them.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator is visually guided to place the correct item in the correct order totes.

tasks.description: The operator repeats the process until all orders in the batch are complete and delivers the cart to the packing area.
tasks.expected_outcome: Multiple orders are picked efficiently in a single trip.
